data.name: Eruption 爆发 Demo
data.detailed_description:
This demo includes first 5 levels of the story mode.
Multiplayer and Free mode are not included.
Progression will be saved and inherited in the retailed game.
data.about_the_game:
This demo includes first 5 levels of the story mode.
Multiplayer and Free mode are not included.
Progression will be saved and inherited in the retailed game.
data.short_description: This demo includes first 5 levels of the story mode. Multiplayer and Free mode are not included. Progression will be saved and inherited in the retailed game.

content_descriptors.notes:
Caution!
This game includes vivid combat scenes. Please don't imitate any of the actions!
Some scenarios contents nudity!
This game actually is urging you to stay away from the violence. Please be kind to people around you.
